trans-unit.source: Defines and represents a constructor of a dynamic class.
trans-unit.target: 定義及表示動態類別的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder> is used to fully describe a constructor in Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), including the name, attributes, signature, and constructor body.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder> 用於完整描述的建構函式中的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，包括名稱、 屬性、 簽章和建構函式主體。

trans-unit.source: It is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> class to create classes at run time.
trans-unit.target: 它用於搭配<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>類別以建立在執行階段類別。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineConstructor%2A> to get an instance of <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineConstructor%2A>來取得執行個體的<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: If you do not define a constructor for your dynamic type, a default constructor is provided automatically, and it calls the default constructor of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有定義建構函式為動態類型，自動提供預設建構函式，而且它會呼叫基底類別的預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: If you use <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder> to define a constructor for your dynamic type, a default constructor is not provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder>若要定義您的動態類型的建構函式，不提供預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: You have the following options for providing a default constructor in addition to the constructor you defined:
trans-unit.target: 您有下列選項來提供預設建構函式，除了您所定義的建構函式：

trans-unit.source: If you want a default constructor that simply calls the default constructor of the base class, you can use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineDefaultConstructor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to create one (and optionally restrict access to it).
trans-unit.target: 如果您想只會呼叫基底類別的預設建構函式的預設建構函式，您可以使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineDefaultConstructor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來建立一個 （並選擇性地限制存取）。

trans-unit.source: Do not provide an implementation for this default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 請提供此預設建構函式的實作。

trans-unit.source: If you do, an exception is thrown when you try to use the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果您這樣做，當您嘗試使用建構函式時，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 沒有例外狀況時擲回<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If you want a default constructor that does something more than simply calling the default constructor of the base class, or that calls another constructor of the base class, or that does something else entirely, you must use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineConstructor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to create a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder>, and provide your own implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要的預設建構函式會不只呼叫預設建構函式的基底類別，或呼叫其他建構函式的基底類別，或沒有其他項目完全，您必須使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineConstructor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>建立方法<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder>，並提供您自己的實作。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the contextual usage of a `ConstructorBuilder`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將說明內容的使用方式的`ConstructorBuilder`。

trans-unit.source: The security action to be taken, such as Demand, Assert, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 採取如要求、判斷提示等安全性動作。

trans-unit.source: The set of permissions the action applies to.
trans-unit.target: 此動作適用的權限集。

trans-unit.source: Adds declarative security to this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 將宣告式安全性加入此建構函式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder.AddDeclarativeSecurity%2A> can be called several times, with each call specifying a security action (such as `Demand`, `Assert`, and `Deny`) and a set of permissions that the action applies to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder.AddDeclarativeSecurity%2A> 也可以呼叫多次，每次呼叫指定的安全性動作 (例如`Demand`， `Assert`，和`Deny`) 和一組要套用動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0, 1.1, and 2.0, the declarative security attributes applied to a constructor by using this method are stored in the old XML metadata format.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0、 1.1 和 2.0 版中，使用此方法套用至建構函式的宣告式安全性屬性會儲存在舊的 XML 中繼資料格式。

trans-unit.source: See Emitting Declarative Security Attributes.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱發出宣告式安全性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of `AddDeclarativeSecurity`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`AddDeclarativeSecurity`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="action" /> is invalid (RequestMinimum, RequestOptional, and RequestRefuse are invalid).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action" /> 是無效的 (RequestMinimum、RequestOptional 和 RequestRefuse 是無效的)。

trans-unit.source: The containing type has been previously created using <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" />.
trans-unit.target: 之前已使用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 建立包含類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The permission set <paramref name="pset" /> contains an action that was added earlier by <see langword="AddDeclarativeSecurity" />.
trans-unit.target: 權限集 <paramref name="pset" /> 包含稍早 <see langword="AddDeclarativeSecurity" /> 所加入的動作。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pset" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pset" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the attributes for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個建構函式的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the attributes for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個建構函式的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of `Attributes`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`Attributes`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CallingConventions" /> value that depends on whether the declaring type is generic.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CallingConventions" /> 值，該值取決於宣告的類型是否為泛型。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.HasThis" /> if the declaring type is generic; otherwise, <see cref="F:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.Standard" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果宣告的類型是泛型，則為 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.HasThis" />，否則為 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.Standard" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object for the type that declares this member.
trans-unit.target: 擷取宣告此成員類型之 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object for the type that declares this member.
trans-unit.target: 傳回宣告此成員類型之 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: A member of a class (or interface) is either declared or inherited from a base class (or interface).
trans-unit.target: 類別 （或介面） 的成員宣告或繼承自基底類別 （或介面）。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of `DeclaringType`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`DeclaringType`。

trans-unit.source: The position of the parameter in the parameter list.
trans-unit.target: 在參數清單中參數的位置。

trans-unit.source: Parameters are indexed beginning with the number 1 for the first parameter.
trans-unit.target: 第一個參數的參數從數字 1 開始索引。

trans-unit.source: The attributes of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name can be the null string.
trans-unit.target: 名稱可以是 null 字串。

trans-unit.source: Defines a parameter of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 定義這個建構函式的參數。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see langword="ParameterBuilder" /> object that represents the new parameter of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see langword="ParameterBuilder" /> 物件，代表這個建構函式的新參數。

trans-unit.source: If you specify 0 (zero) for `iSequence`, this method returns a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder> instead of throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定 0 （零） `iSequence`，這個方法會傳回<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder>而不是擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: There is nothing useful that you can do with this <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 需要您可以執行與此<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="iSequence" /> is less than 0 (zero), or it is greater than the number of parameters of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="iSequence" /> 小於 0 (零) 或大於建構函式的參數數目。

trans-unit.source: The containing type has been created using <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" />.
trans-unit.target: 已使用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 建立包含類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the custom attributes defined for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回為這個建構函式定義的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: Controls inheritance of custom attributes from base classes.
trans-unit.target: 控制自訂屬性來自基底類別的繼承。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the custom attributes defined for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回為這個建構函式定義的所有自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of objects representing all the custom attributes of the constructor represented by this <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件陣列，表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder" /> 執行個體 (Instance) 所表示的建構函式的所有自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `inherit` parameter is ignored because a class never inherits constructors from base classes.
trans-unit.target: `inherit`參數會被忽略，因為類別絕不會繼承自基底類別建構函式。

trans-unit.source: To get the custom attributes, finish building the type by calling <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>, retrieve the constructor by calling the <xref:System.Type.GetConstructor%2A> method on the returned type, and then call the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A> method on the returned <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的自訂屬性，完成 建立類型，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>，建構函式擷取由呼叫<xref:System.Type.GetConstructor%2A>方法傳回的型別，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A>方法在傳回<xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo>。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The custom attribute type.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: Controls inheritance of custom attributes from base classes.
trans-unit.target: 控制自訂屬性來自基底類別的繼承。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: Returns the custom attributes identified by the given type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定類型所識別的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of type <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the attributes of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 型別的陣列，表示這個建構函式的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `inherit` parameter is ignored because a class never inherits constructors from base classes.
trans-unit.target: `inherit`參數會被忽略，因為類別絕不會繼承自基底類別建構函式。

trans-unit.source: To get the custom attributes, finish building the type by calling <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>, retrieve the constructor by calling the <xref:System.Type.GetConstructor%2A> method on the returned type, and then call the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A> method on the returned <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的自訂屬性，完成 建立類型，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>，建構函式擷取由呼叫<xref:System.Type.GetConstructor%2A>方法傳回的型別，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A>方法在傳回<xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo>。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator" /> that can be used to emit a method body for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator" />，其可用於發出這個建構函式的方法主體。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator" /> for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個建構函式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator" /> object for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個建構函式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The runtime generates the code for default constructors.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段產生預設建構函式的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if an attempt is made to obtain an `ILGenerator`, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果嘗試取得`ILGenerator`，將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of the `GetILGenerator` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`GetILGenerator`方法。

trans-unit.source: The constructor is a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式是預設的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The constructor has <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes" /> or <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes" /> flags indicating that it should not have a method body.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式具有 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes" /> 旗標，表示它不該有方法主體。

trans-unit.source: The size of the MSIL stream, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: MSIL 資料流的大小，以位元組為單位。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator" /> object, with the specified MSIL stream size, that can be used to build a method body for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator" /> 具有指定的 MSIL 資料流大小的物件，可以用來建置此建構函式的方法主體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator" /> for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator" />。

trans-unit.source: The runtime generates the code for default constructors.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段產生預設建構函式的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if an attempt is made to obtain an `ILGenerator` for a default constructor, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果嘗試取得`ILGenerator`的預設建構函式，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The constructor is a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式是預設的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The constructor has <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes" /> or <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes" /> flags indicating that it should not have a method body.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式具有 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodAttributes" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes" /> 旗標，表示它不該有方法主體。

trans-unit.source: Returns the method implementation flags for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的這個建構函式的方法實作旗標。

trans-unit.source: The method implementation flags for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的方法實作旗標。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of `GetMethodImplementationFlags`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`GetMethodImplementationFlags`。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the module that contains this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含這個建構函式之模組的參考。

trans-unit.source: The module that contains this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 包含這個建構函式的模組。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the usage of `GetModule`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明使用`GetModule`。

trans-unit.source: Returns the parameters of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個建構函式的參數。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> objects that represent the parameters of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> 物件陣列，其表示這個建構函式的參數。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported until after the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不支援直到之後<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0, <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The code sample illustrates the use of `GetParameters`.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例示範如何使用`GetParameters`。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> has not been called on this constructor's type, in the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1.
trans-unit.target: 在 .NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，尚未在這個建構函式的型別上呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> has not been called on this constructor's type, in the .NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 .NET Framework 2.0 中，尚未在這個建構函式的型別上呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodToken" /> that represents the token for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodToken" />，其表示這個建構函式的語彙基元 (Token)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodToken" /> of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個建構函式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodToken" />。

trans-unit.source: This code sample illustrates the use of `GetToken`.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼範例示範如何使用`GetToken`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the local variables in this constructor should be zero-initialized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個建構函式中的本機變數是否應該以零初始化。

trans-unit.source: Read/write.
trans-unit.target: 讀取/寫入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the local variables in this constructor should be zero-initialized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個建構函式中的本機變數是否應該以零初始化。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the constructor dynamically reflected by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 叫用此執行個體動態反映的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />, such as InvokeMethod, NonPublic, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 這必須是 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 的位元旗標，例如 InvokeMethod、NonPublic 等等。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see langword="MemberInfo" /> objects using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 使用反映來啟用繫結、強制引數的類型、成員的引動過程，和擷取 <see langword="MemberInfo" /> 物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: If binder is <see langword="null" />, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果繫結器為 <see langword="null" />，則會使用預設繫結器。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />。

trans-unit.source: An argument list.
trans-unit.target: 引數清單。

trans-unit.source: This is an array of arguments with the same number, order, and type as the parameters of the constructor to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 這是引數陣列，其數目、順序和類型與要叫用的建構函式參數相同。

trans-unit.source: If there are no parameters this should be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有參數，則這應該為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> used to govern the coercion of types.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 的執行個體，用於管理類型的強制型轉。

trans-unit.source: If this is null, the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是 null，會使用目前執行緒的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />

trans-unit.source: (For example, this is necessary to convert a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents 1000 to a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value, since 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.)
trans-unit.target: (例如，這有必要將表示為 1000 的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 值，因為 1000 在不同文化特性中有不同的表示方式)。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the constructor dynamically reflected by this instance on the given object, passing along the specified parameters, and under the constraints of the given binder.
trans-unit.target: 叫用此執行個體在指定物件上動態反映的建構函式，會沿著指定參數，並在指定繫結器的條件約束下傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the return value of the invoked constructor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，為所叫用建構函式的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: If the constructor has no parameters, the value of the `parameters` parameter should be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果建構函式沒有任何參數，值`parameters`參數應該是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the number, type, and order of elements in the `parameters` array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the constructor reflected by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 否則數字、 類型和順序中的項目`parameters`陣列應該數目、 類型與這個執行個體所反映的建構函式參數的順序相同。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the constructor reflected by this instance is declared as public class taking two strings, then the `parameters` parameter should be an array of <xref:System.Object> with length 2.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果這個執行個體所反映的建構函式宣告為公用類別接受兩個字串，然後在`parameters`參數應該是陣列<xref:System.Object>長度為 2。

trans-unit.source: Access restrictions are ignored for fully-trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任的程式碼會忽略存取限制。

trans-unit.source: That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可以存取，而且只要完全信任程式碼使用反映來叫用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the constructor using <see cref="M:System.Type.GetConstructor(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Reflection.CallingConventions,System.Type[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[])" /> and call <see cref="M:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.Invoke(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> on the returned <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <see cref="M:System.Type.GetConstructor(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Reflection.CallingConventions,System.Type[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[])" /> 擷取建構函式，並在傳回的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.Invoke(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> 上呼叫 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The object that needs to be reinitialized.
trans-unit.target: 必須重新初始化的物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="BindingFlags" /> values that specifies the type of binding that is desired.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see langword="BindingFlags" /> 值，指定所要的繫結型別。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Binder" /> that defines a set of properties and enables the binding, coercion of argument types, and invocation of members using reflection.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Binder" />，其定義一組屬性，並使用反映來啟用繫結、引數型別的強制型轉和成員引動過程。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is <see langword="null" />, then Binder.DefaultBinding is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果「繫結器」<c></c>是 <see langword="null" />，則會使用 Binder.DefaultBinding。

trans-unit.source: An argument list.
trans-unit.target: 引數清單。

trans-unit.source: This is an array of arguments with the same number, order, and type as the parameters of the constructor to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 這是引數陣列，其數目、順序和類型與要叫用的建構函式參數相同。

trans-unit.source: If there are no parameters, this should be a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有參數存在，則這應該是 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> used to govern the coercion of types.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />，用來控制型別的強制型轉。

trans-unit.source: If this is null, the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是 null，會使用目前執行緒的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />

trans-unit.source: Dynamically invokes the constructor reflected by this instance with the specified arguments, under the constraints of the specified <see langword="Binder" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定引數，在指定 <see langword="Binder" /> 的約束下，動態叫用這個執行個體所反映的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the class associated with the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 與建構函式相關聯的類別之執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The number, type, and order of elements in the parameters array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the constructor reflected by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 數字、 類型和參數陣列中項目的順序應該是數字、 型別和這個執行個體所反映的建構函式參數的順序相同。

trans-unit.source: Before calling the constructor, `Invoke` ensures that the caller has access permission, and that the parameters are of the correct number, order and type.
trans-unit.target: 然後再呼叫建構函式，`Invoke`可確保呼叫端具有存取權限，以及參數是否正確數目、 順序和類型。

trans-unit.source: Access restrictions are ignored for fully-trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任的程式碼會忽略存取限制。

trans-unit.source: That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可以存取，而且只要完全信任程式碼使用反映來叫用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the constructor using <see cref="M:System.Type.GetConstructor(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Reflection.CallingConventions,System.Type[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[])" /> and call <see cref="M:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.Invoke(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> on the returned <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <see cref="M:System.Type.GetConstructor(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Reflection.CallingConventions,System.Type[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[])" /> 擷取建構函式，並在傳回的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo.Invoke(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> 上呼叫 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: A custom attribute type.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: Controls inheritance of custom attributes from base classes.
trans-unit.target: 控制自訂屬性來自基底類別的繼承。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數已忽略。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the specified custom attribute type is defined.
trans-unit.target: 檢查是否已定義指定的自訂屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified custom attribute type is defined; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的自訂屬性型別已定義，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: See the metadata specification for details on how to format `binaryAttribute`.
trans-unit.target: 有關如何格式化，請參閱詳細資料的中繼資料規格`binaryAttribute`。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the constructor using <see cref="M:System.Type.GetConstructor(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Reflection.CallingConventions,System.Type[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[])" /> and call <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> on the returned <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <see cref="M:System.Type.GetConstructor(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Reflection.CallingConventions,System.Type[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[])" /> 擷取建構函式，並在傳回的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> 上呼叫 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the internal handle for the method.
trans-unit.target: 擷取方法的內部控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Use this handle to access the underlying metadata handle.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個控制代碼來存取基礎中繼資料控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns the internal handle for the method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回方法的內部控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Use this handle to access the underlying metadata handle.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個控制代碼來存取基礎中繼資料控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported on this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the dynamic module in which this constructor is defined.
trans-unit.target: 取得在其中定義這個建構函式的動態模組。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Module" /> object that represents the dynamic module in which this constructor is defined.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Module" /> 物件，表示要在其中定義這個建構函式的動態模組。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the same value as the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder.GetModule%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回相同的值<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder.GetModule%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the name of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個建構函式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個建構函式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of `Name`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`Name`。

trans-unit.source: Holds a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object from which this object was obtained.
trans-unit.target: 保留這個物件取自的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see langword="Type" /> object from which this object was obtained.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see langword="Type" /> 物件，就是這個物件取自的來源物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder> object represents a constructor on a particular class.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder>物件都代表在特定類別的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: In order to obtain a <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo> object, the <xref:System.Type> object that represents the class that supports the constructor is queried.
trans-unit.target: 為了取得<xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo>物件<xref:System.Type>會查詢物件，表示支援的建構函式的類別。

trans-unit.source: This property holds a reference to that <xref:System.Type> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會保留的參考，<xref:System.Type>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property might be removed in a future version.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可能會在未來版本中移除。

trans-unit.source: Sets a custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 設定自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a helper class to define the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 定義自訂屬性的協助程式類別執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Set a custom attribute using a custom attribute builder.
trans-unit.target: 使用自訂屬性產生器來設定自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of `SetCustomAttribute` of the context of a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder>, passing a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`SetCustomAttribute`內容的<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder>，並傳遞<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="customBuilder" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="customBuilder" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A byte blob representing the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 代表屬性的位元組 Blob。

trans-unit.source: Set a custom attribute using a specified custom attribute blob.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的自訂屬性 Blob 來設定自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: See the metadata specification in the ECMA Partition II documentation for details on how to format `binaryAttribute`.
trans-unit.target: 有關如何格式化，請參閱 ECMA 第二篇文件以取得詳細資料中的中繼資料規格`binaryAttribute`。

trans-unit.source: The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.
trans-unit.target: 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of `SetCustomAttribute` of the context of a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder>, passing a byte blob.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`SetCustomAttribute`內容的<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder>，傳遞的位元組 blob。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="con" /> or <paramref name="binaryAttribute" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="con" /> 或 <paramref name="binaryAttribute" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The method implementation flags.
trans-unit.target: 方法實作旗標。

trans-unit.source: Sets the method implementation flags for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個建構函式的方法實作旗標。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of `SetImplementationFlags`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`SetImplementationFlags`。

trans-unit.source: The containing type has been created using <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" />.
trans-unit.target: 已使用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 建立包含類型。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains valid MSIL instructions.
trans-unit.target: 包含有效 MSIL 指令的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The maximum stack evaluation depth.
trans-unit.target: 最大堆疊評估深度。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes that contain the serialized local variable structure.
trans-unit.target: 包含已序列化之區域變數結構的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Specify <see langword="null" /> if the constructor has no local variables.
trans-unit.target: 若建構函式沒有任何本機變數，則指定 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the exception handlers for the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 包含這個建構函式之例外處理常式的集合。

trans-unit.source: Specify <see langword="null" /> if the constructor has no exception handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若建構函式沒有任何例外狀況處理常式，則指定 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection of values that represent offsets in <c>il</c>, each of which specifies the beginning of a token that may be modified.
trans-unit.target: 代表 <c>il</c> 中位移的值集合，其中每個都指定可能修改之權杖的開始位置。

trans-unit.source: Specify <see langword="null" /> if the constructor has no tokens that have to be modified.
trans-unit.target: 如果建構函式沒有要修改的語彙基元，則指定 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates the body of the constructor by using a specified byte array of Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instructions.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指令的指定位元組陣列，建立建構函式的主體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="il" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="il" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="maxStack" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="maxStack" /> 為負。

trans-unit.source: -or-
One of <paramref name="exceptionHandlers" /> specifies an offset outside of <paramref name="il" />.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <paramref name="exceptionHandlers" /> 指定位於 <paramref name="il" /> 之外的位移。

trans-unit.source: -or-
One of <paramref name="tokenFixups" /> specifies an offset that is outside the <paramref name="il" /> array.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <paramref name="tokenFixups" /> 指定超出 <paramref name="il" /> 陣列之外的位移。

trans-unit.source: The containing type was previously created using the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 包含的型別先前已使用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 方法建立。

trans-unit.source: -or-
This method was called previously on this <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 先前已在這個 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder" /> 物件上呼叫此方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value of the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets this constructor's custom attribute associated with symbolic information.
trans-unit.target: 設定此建構函式之與符號資訊相關聯的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of `SetSymCustomAttributes`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`SetSymCustomAttributes`。

trans-unit.source: The containing type has been created using <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" />.
trans-unit.target: 已使用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 建立包含類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The module does not have a symbol writer defined.
trans-unit.target: 此模組並沒有定義的符號寫入器。

trans-unit.source: For example, the module is not a debug module.
trans-unit.target: 例如，模組並非偵錯模組。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the signature of the field in the form of a string.
trans-unit.target: 擷取以字串格式表示的欄位簽章。

trans-unit.source: Returns the signature of the field.
trans-unit.target: 傳回欄位簽章。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 保留供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必須是 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: Passed-in array of names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要對應之傳入的名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: Count of the names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要對應的名稱計數。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret the names.
trans-unit.target: 用於解譯名稱的地區設定內容。

trans-unit.source: Caller-allocated array which receives the IDs corresponding to the names.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端配置的陣列，用於接收對應於名稱的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 將一組名稱對應至一組對應的分派識別項 (Dispatch Identifier)。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Late-bound access using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結的存取。

trans-unit.source: The type information to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: The locale identifier for the type information.
trans-unit.target: 類型資訊的地區設定識別項。

trans-unit.source: Receives a pointer to the requested type information object.
trans-unit.target: 接收要求的類型資訊物件的指標。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can then be used to get the type information for an interface.
trans-unit.target: 擷取物件的類型資訊，可以用來取得介面的類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Late-bound access using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結的存取。

trans-unit.source: Points to a location that receives the number of type information interfaces provided by the object.
trans-unit.target: 指向接收物件提供的類型資訊介面數目的位置。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).
trans-unit.target: 擷取物件提供的類型資訊介面數目 (0 或 1)。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Late-bound access using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結的存取。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the member.
trans-unit.target: 辨識成員。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 保留供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必須是 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret arguments.
trans-unit.target: 地區設定內容，用於解譯引數。

trans-unit.source: Flags describing the context of the call.
trans-unit.target: 描述呼叫之內容的旗標。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.
trans-unit.target: 結構的指標，此結構包含引數陣列、指名引數之 DISPID 引數的陣列，以及陣列中項目數目的計數。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the location where the result is to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 指向用於儲存結果之位置的指標。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure that contains exception information.
trans-unit.target: 包含例外狀況資訊的結構指標。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first argument that has an error.
trans-unit.target: 第一個有錯誤的引數索引。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.
trans-unit.target: 提供物件所公開的屬性和方法的存取權。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::Invoke`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Late-bound access using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結的存取。

trans-unit.source: Returns this <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder" /> instance as a <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder" /> 執行個體為 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name, attributes, and exceptions of this constructor, followed by the current Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) stream.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含這個建構函式的名稱、屬性和例外狀況，其後是目前的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 資料流。
